metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart is angry at the player for harming  her parent(s).
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the grotto.2. Harm Shadowheart's parents before her

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Touch them again and it'll be the last thing you do!

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: Stop - they're mine to deal with. Touch them and you die.
